knimeNode.name: Splitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits the columns of the input table into two output tables.

fullDescription.intro: This node splits the columns of the input table into two output tables. Specify in the dialog which columns should occur in the top table (left list), and the bottom table (right list). Use the buttons to move columns from one list to the other.
fullDescription.option: A list of column names that make up the first output table (top output port).
A list of column names that make up the second output table (bottom output port).

ports.outPort: Input table with the columns as defined in the dialog's left list.
Input table with the columns as defined in the dialog's right list.
